select_buyer: SELECT * FROM test.kupci WHERE kupac_id = %s AND ime_kupca = %s AND prezime_kupca = %s AND username = %s AND pass = %s
select_sales: SELECT * FROM test.prodavci  WHERE prodavac_id =%s AND name = %s AND surname = %s AND username =%s AND lozinka =%s AND number_id =%s
select_buyer_username: SELECT username from test.kupci WHERE username =%s
select_saler_username: SELECT username from test.prodavci WHERE username =%s
select_hash: UPDATE  test.hash SET password=%s WHERE password=%s
